Instance Method# rotated(by:around:)

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
func rotated(
    by rotation: Rotation3DFloat,
    around pivot: Point3DFloat
) -> Rect3DFloat
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/Spatial/Rect3DFloat/rotated(by:around:)-1g90c#parameters)

`rotation`The rotation.

`pivot`The center of rotation.

## [Return Value](/documentation/Spatial/Rect3DFloat/rotated(by:around:)-1g90c#return-value)

A point that’s rotated by the specified rotation.

## [Discussion](/documentation/Spatial/Rect3DFloat/rotated(by:around:)-1g90c#discussion)

Returns a rectangle that’s rotated by a rotation around a specified pivot.
